pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 | AMD A4-7300
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 | Radeon R7 240
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible model
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 | AMD Radeon R7 26
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible model

content_descriptors.notes: Some illustrations may contain nudity, be sure to protect the most sensitive.
